content:
Estimated Examples:
Example 1:
Text: I've heard you say you have quite a collection of dog books. Any chance you could list them for us?
Annotation from annotator: 16

Example 2:
Text: Can you expand <url>? From what I gather the Dorje Ling nunnery is part of the monastery complex?
Annotation from annotator: 12

Example 3:
Text: On another note, I'm going to assume that you were the one who also added ridership data for various LIRR stations, am I correct? If so, could you kindly point me towards your source?
Annotation from annotator: 12

Example 4:
Text: Okay, perhaps we need to initiate a task force to go and address issues on these lists.  I'm happy to participate or rubber-stamp... What do you think?
Annotation from annotator: 13

Example 5:
Text: Could you please explain <url> to me? I don't see how deleting a person's userpage is correct?
Annotation from annotator: 11

Example 6:
Text: I was wondering where you got your information for the dice statistics you recently added/changed in <url>.  Can you add a source to those tables?
Annotation from annotator: 16

Example 7:
Text: Yes, this is the English Wikipedia so we use the English version of the infobox. And can there once be a time when you don't find your way to my talk a complain?
Annotation from annotator: 8

Example 8:
Text: Your <url> is a brilliant idea! Would you mind if I linked to it from my collection of "Useful things" on my user page?
Annotation from annotator: 20

Example 9:
Text: When am I changing nationalities? I do remove flags when I encounter them per <url> and <url>, but changing them...?
Annotation from annotator: 9

Example 10:
Text: Sorry, I dont quite remember what we were talking about.  Can you tell me what you were/are confused about?
Annotation from annotator: 17

Example 11:
Text: Your POV tag justified. Did you get any support for cleaning it up?
Annotation from annotator: 13

Example 12:
Text: No, I didn't know that. Where does this "rule" come from?
Annotation from annotator: 8

Example 13:
Text: What articles are you currently working on improving and/or writing? Anything?
Annotation from annotator: 11

Example 14:
Text: Thanks for the alert.  By the way, how's Granny doing?
Annotation from annotator: 19

Example 15:
Text: Thanks, firstly, for the affirmation and work on <url>; it was yesterday's featured article! As a related article, I've been working on <url> - what do you think would be necessary to get it to FA?
Annotation from annotator: 18

Example 16:
Text: Please explain this <url>. Is there a valid reason why this image was removed?
Annotation from annotator: 9

Example 17:
Text: Since the "discussion" was not advertised at the affected pages, it did not involve the "community". Do you not see that?
Annotation from annotator: 5

Example 18:
Text: Personally I think (much) longer gallery captions are probably the answer; these are probably easier than working each image into the text. Didn't that work at s***-p*******?
Annotation from annotator: 12

Example 19:
Text: Excuse me? What are you accusing me of doing?
Annotation from annotator: 6

Example 20:
Text: Ok then. DO you want to set up another Peer Review for <url>?
Annotation from annotator: 15

Example 21:
Text: That "guest" could have been an undercover Colbert staff member and the whole segment could have been staged. Otherwise, why would Colbert have taken 3 minutes out of his show to talk to someone in the audience?
Annotation from annotator: 9

Example 22:
Text: <url> needs urdu script for the name of the subject (Bangla script has already been added). Can you help?
Annotation from annotator: 11

Example 23:
Text: I think it look tidier. What do you think?
Annotation from annotator: 13

Example 24:
Text: I wasn't planning on it before I asked you about it. I figured, afterwards, why inquire if the template's really too long as it is?
Annotation from annotator: 10

Example 25:
Text: - This IP has been doing the same to me. There seems to be a remarkable similarity with <url>, could this be a case of sockpuppeting?
Annotation from annotator: 12

Example 26:
Text: Thanks for your reply. I've tried to incorporate the references into the article; how is it now?
Annotation from annotator: 17

Example 27:
Text: I thought our short conversation last evening showed that cooperation might be possible. Was I wrong?
Annotation from annotator: 13

Example 28:
Text: I am not sure what are rules about GA in en.wiki but for me <url> is really outdated and it shouldn`t have GA sign. What you think?
Annotation from annotator: 13

Example 29:
Text: Never mind, got it. Is the stereochemistry known?
Annotation from annotator: 9

Example 30:
Text: I am contemplating a larger article on this very interesting topic. Thoughts?
Annotation from annotator: 18

Examples from the dataset (there may not be any):Examples from the dataset (there may not be any)
Example 1:
Text: <url> is fooling around with the Rubinstein and Horowitz articles again.  Is there a way to get him banned?
Annotation from annotator: 8

Example 2:
Text: See my comments on the article's talk page, which is on my watchlist by the way. Be bold?
Annotation from annotator: 12

Example 3:
Text: Re your remarks on the talk page of 9/11: '''I do not troll'''. Comprende?
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 4:
Text: So it seems we both already know the problems with the current logo and the SVG one. What can I do to help you?
Annotation from annotator: 8

Example 5:
Text: Do You have the list of other flag bearers from other countries? And do you have a video link of the parade of nations?
Annotation from annotator: 24

Example 6:
Text: I am waiting for some belly rubs, and my little fangs are sticking out! Can you believe it, in real life I'm exactly that cute?
Annotation from annotator: 12

Example 7:
Text: OK, I'll bite. How is ''Matt "Dirty" Sanchez'' to be construed as anything other than a personal attack?
Annotation from annotator: 8

Example 8:
Text: I don't follow.  Can you address the above with regard to why it ''shouldn't'' be speedily deleted, as a recreation of deleted material, and as a content fork?
Annotation from annotator: 8

Example 9:
Text: If you were falsely accused of vandalism, the best thing to do is to talk to the user who accused you, and explain why your edit was not vandalism. Which user accused you vandalism?
Annotation from annotator: 20

Example 10:
Text: Hello. Can you please pass the pilot whale article?
Annotation from annotator: 24

Example 11:
Text: Hi. The font-size for the links in this template may be on the small side, but it seems to be floating okay -- or do I need to check more places where it's used?
Annotation from annotator: 22

Example 12:
Text: And  what did I do wrong???????????????????????
Annotation from annotator: 0

Target Example:
Text: I don't think I've used it in Wikipedia.  So, if I haven't, why did you bring it up?
Annotation from annotator:
